mapper.select: select files.*, CASE WHEN userfilesMarks.user_id = #{userId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isMarkable FROM FILES left join SUBJECTS_FILES subj_files ON subj_files.FILE_ID = files.ID left join (select * from USERS_FILES_MARKS usersMarks where usersMarks.USER_ID = #{userId}) userfilesMarks on userFilesMarks.file_id = files.ID where subj_files.SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId} and name = #{criteria}
mapper.insert: insert into FILES(FILENAME, DESCRIPTION, URL, RATING, RATING_COUNT, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE) values (#{file.name}, #{file.description}, #{file.url}, #{file.rating}, #{file.ratingCount}, #{file.createUserId}, #{file.createDate})
mapper.update: update FILES set FILENAME = #{file.name}, DESCRIPTION = #{file.description}, URL = #{file.url}, RATING = #{file.rating}, RATING_COUNT = #{file.ratingCount} where ID = #{file.id}
update FILES set RATING_COUNT = RATING_COUNT+1, RATING = RATING+1 WHERE ID=#{id}
